titleInfo.title: Letter, Francis A. Ramsey in Swan Pond, Tenn., to Mr. and Mrs. Reynolds Ramsey in Gettys Town, Penn. 1800 Sept. 25

mods.abstract: 1800 Sept. 25, Francis A. Ramsey, Swan Pond, Tenn., to his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Reynolds Ramsey, Gettys Town, Adams County, Penn. Description of the illness and death of his son, Samuel Reynolds. Description of the death of an aunt and news of the illness of another aunt. Also, requests information as to why his parents had not written him in over a year's time.

subject.topic: Death notices -- Tennessee, East -- History -- 19th century.
